snippet.title: The Specialists - Half Life Mod - Gameplay
snippet.description: Oldskool Deathmatch. Its a fast paced, blood splattered, duel berretta, action packed john woo / matrix crossover! Get the kills whatever your style, big single handcannons to akimbo uzi 9mm madness, spray n pray with the assult rifles or go semi auto mode, pistol whips and butt smacks,  kung fu and katanas for those that like to get in close, and if ya feelin like arnie go the m60 and blow the hell outta the map commando style ;)
